img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 44.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e6/Wukong_LowerHollow_44.jpg)
He can also perform a tricky move to counter where he jumps into the air, and pauses for a moment before slamming down with his rake. He'll immediately slide past you, pivoting to slam down again when you think you've evaded the attack.
img_below_text:
He can also steal a trick from Guangzhi and use his rake like a pogo stick, slamming down with it before hopping up and spin into another downward slash attack.
![Wukong LowerHollow 42.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8a/Wukong_LowerHollow_42.jpg)

        Your task:

        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat sequence from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist engaged in a dynamic battle against Zhu Bajie, a prominent enemy. The scene highlights Zhu Bajie's powerful aerial attack, where he leaps into the air and slams down with his rake, creating dramatic visual effects such as debris and energy bursts. The preceding and following text describe Zhu Bajie's advanced combat techniques, emphasizing his ability to perform consecutive slam attacks and mimic moves from other characters, adding complexity to the encounter.
